description: This old 18C farmhouse has exposed brick, ceiling beams and an impressive fireplace. It makes a feast of tasty, Tuscan cuisine elaborated from local ingredients, especially meat. Settle into the comfortable chairs and indulge in the pleasure of dining snugly.
